body.name: Andency Full Size Blue Comforter Set (79x90 Inch), 3 Pieces Gray and Blue Patchwork Striped Comforter, Soft Microfiber Down Alternative Comforter Bedding Set Bed in a Bag with Corner Loops
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 mins
FREE delivery on orders over $35 shipped by Amazon.
features: [STRIPED PATTERN] Concise stripe pattern now redesigned with 3 color patchwork to add a modern and elegant look to your room. Beautiful color match let this stripe comforter become a great gift choice! Vivid visual effect will make Andency comforter the most appealing place in your room.

[SOFT LIKE CLOUD] With selected double brushed microfiber, you can get a super soft down alternative comforter with less cost. After enjoying its comfy and skin-friendly touch, you won’t leave it. Andency comforter is breathable and comfortable in all seasons and achieves a perfect balance, warm in winter and cool in summer, ensuring you a sound and cozy sleep all night.

[ADEQUATE FILLING] 3D spiral distributed microfiber filling technology can meet your various sleeping posture requirements and always keep lightweight and fluffy. Exquisite stitches enhance strong connection among overfilled fabrics, stable enough to avoid shifting and clumping.

[DURABLE & EASY CARE] The high-density smooth surface guarantees that it will not tear and shrink easily. Advanced yarn-dyed technology keeps away the trouble of fading. Machine washed at room temperature on gentle cycle. Air dry or Tumble dry low heat. Do not bleach and iron. Better wash before first use.

[WHAT YOU CAN GET] Full Comforter Set: 1 comforter (79x90 inch) with corner loops(can be fixed with a duvet cover), 2 pillowcase (20x26 inch) with envelope closure. * Due to manual cutting, pattern of pillowcase is random. If you have any needs or questions, let us know by amazon email and we will give you a timely solution. Your shopping experience is our first priority.

productInformation.name: Product Care Instructions
productInformation.value: Due to the use of vacuum package in transit, the comforter will arrive shriveled and wrinkled. Before first use, please wash it and tumble dry low temperature to reduce the wrinkles and puff the comforter. You can also expose it to the sunlight and tap it gently, then it will fluff up nicely after hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft and fluffy
reviews.reviewText: This product is awesome! It is so soft and looks and feel great! Recommend!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for teen boy.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for my teenage son. He loves the simplicity of the design and the soft material.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2021
reviews.reviewText: ****This is my update. Originally I gave this product 1 star, and because of their excellent customer service I have changed my review to 4 stars. After my review the company reached out to me and told me that they would refund my money in full and I did not need to send my comforter back. I waited a few days before updating this review to make sure that they did in fact refund my money and they have. So even though I now have to buy another comforter I am happy with the customer service I received. I hope that my comforter was just a fluke and that other people purchasing from this company end up satisfied with their purchase. 😁I bought this comforter for my son for Christmas. I knew that it had arrived so I never took it out of the box. Well he unwrapped it, and through the shrink wrap there was a oder like garlic or an ethnic restaurant. Once it was taken out of the shrink wrap the smell was overwhelming. I tried to let it air out, but my entire upstairs bed rooms all smell like this now. I decided to wash it in hopes that the smell would go away. I have now washed it 2 times with fabric beads to help cover the smell and it is not going away. I feel like this may have been a used comforter and I’m not sure if it was kept in a kitchen while meals were being fried, but the smell is awful. There was no photo or original packaging, just the shrink wrapped product. I would like my money back, and find a new/ smell free comforter, but not sure if they will let me return a comforter that has already been washed several times. Money down the drain! Not happy and WOULD NOT recommend purchasing from this company.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bedding for tween/teen that exceeded my expectations
reviews.reviewText: I bought this set sort of on a whim, for my 12 yr old son to freshen up his room a bit. I stumbled across this set and the colors matched his existing throw pillow, and curtains, and for $38 after applying a coupon I though why not, and submitted my order.The comforter and shams arrived the next day, the packaging was very small so I was a little concerned that the comforter was going to be super thin, but after washing and drying it, it’s fluffed up like crazy and is just a perfect mid weight comforter he can use year round, that is also super soft.I am thrilled with my purchase and my son also is very happy with his new bedding. This is seriously one of the best finds I have gotten off of Amazon as far as quality and price. Definitely buy this set, you will not be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful well made comforter.
reviews.reviewText: I really like the colors and the thickness of this comforter. It is well made and warm. It comes with two pillowcases that are pretty too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this from my son. He absolutely loves it. It is so soft and so warm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very wrinkly fabric not cotton printed pictures not sewn patchwork
reviews.reviewText: Overall it looks nice, but the item was in a very small vacuumed sealed bag and when opened it was so wrinkly. It never filled out or got thick. (There was no instructions saying it would, I just assumed with all the other vacuumed sealed stuff it would fill out some). It is extremely light weight. It is 2 pieces of fabric with maybe a thin piece of batting inside. Good for summer but I would not recommend it for winter months. The fabric is not cotton, it's a silky feeling poly blend type fabric. The design is printed on the blanket it is not patches/sections sewn like it seems. I like it over all but it slides off the bed and probably will not hold up with multiple washings. I would think this is slightly over priced for the quality at the $40 price point. This is more like a $20 price point at one of the chain stores.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This comforter is beautiful in the mint green stripe. Really looked great in my guest room. I feel it's hot to sleep under, but I tend to be hot natured. The only drawback I have is that it's so slippery, it tends to slip off one side of the bed during the night. I've washed it several times hoping to remedy that, but it didn't work. Other than that, it's a beautiful comforter and definitely worth the price.
